Properties.commandText:
SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[CreateON], [t].[PermissionStatus], [t].[Id], [r].[Title]
FROM [Role] AS [r]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[PermissionStatus], [r0].[Id], [r0].[RoleId]
    FROM [RolePermission] AS [r0]
    WHERE [r0].[Deleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [r].[Id] = [t].[RoleId]
ORDER BY [r].[Id]

Properties.commandText:
SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[CreateON], [t].[PermissionStatus], [t].[Id], [r].[Title]
FROM [Role] AS [r]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[PermissionStatus], [r0].[Id], [r0].[RoleId]
    FROM [RolePermission] AS [r0]
    WHERE [r0].[Deleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [r].[Id] = [t].[RoleId]
ORDER BY [r].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Name], [t].[ImageName], [t].[Description], [t].[Id], [t0].[ProductID], [t0].[CategoryID], [t0].[CategoryName], [t0].[Id], [p1].[ProductID], [p1].[PictureID], [p2].[Name], [p2].[Value], [p2].[Id]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Name], [p].[ImageName], [p].[Description], [p].[Id]
    FROM [Product] AS [p]
    WHERE [p].[Deleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [p].[Id] = @__productId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProductID], [p0].[CategoryID], [c].[Name] AS [CategoryName], [c].[Id]
    FROM [ProductCategory] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [Category].[Categories] AS [c] ON [p0].[CategoryID] = [c].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProductID]
LEFT JOIN [ProductPicture] AS [p1] ON [t].[Id] = [p1].[ProductID]
LEFT JOIN [ProductSpecification] AS [p2] ON [t].[Id] = [p2].[ProductId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[ProductID], [t0].[CategoryID], [t0].[Id], [p1].[ProductID], [p1].[PictureID]

MessageTemplate: Executed action method {ActionName}, returned result {ActionResult} in {ElapsedMilliseconds}ms.
